body:
@bradfitz I think that there are two issues here which should be two separate bugs (even if they have the same root cause or solution).

- Konstantin Shaposhnikov is discussing 1.5 vs. 1.6 performance and GC scalability on large hardware
- As discussed in [this thread](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-dev/sfwfQTu7eM4/0cZYMMqbBwAJ), the InfluxDB folks explained that they have throughput problems with 1.4 vs. 1.5+ and are currently pinned to 1.4 for production builds. The Influx folks have said they will file an issue and provide debugging info.

/cc @jwilder @toddboom @pauldix
